trans-unit.source: This diagram illustrates <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in a multi-server configuration (<MadCap:xref href="#Lina_MS_config" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>):

seg-source.mrk: This diagram illustrates <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in a multi-server configuration (<MadCap:xref href="#Lina_MS_config" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>):

target.mrk: Ce schéma présente <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> dans une configuration multi-serveur (<MadCap:xref href="#Lina_MS_config" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>):

trans-unit.source: A <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> multi-server configuration is composed of a main <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server (master server) that centralizes the management of several <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> servers called nodes. This type of configuration can be used with <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> only.

seg-source.mrk: A <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> multi-server configuration is composed of a main <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server (master server) that centralizes the management of several <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> servers called nodes.
This type of configuration can be used with <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> only.

target.mrk: Une configuration multi-serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> est composée d'un serveur principal <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (serveur master) qui centralise la gestion de plusieurs serveurs <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> appelés nœuds.
Ce type de configuration ne peut être utilisé qu'avec <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: A <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> multi-server configuration improves agents and server management. As a result:

seg-source.mrk: A <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> multi-server configuration improves agents and server management.

target.mrk: Une configuration multi-serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> améliore la gestion des agents et des serveurs.

trans-unit.source: You can use as many agents and servers as necessary. The number of agents is not limited anymore.

seg-source.mrk: You can use as many agents and servers as necessary.
The number of agents is not limited anymore.

target.mrk: Vous pouvez utiliser autant d'agents et de serveurs que nécessaire.
Le nombre d'agents n'est plus limité.

trans-unit.source: You can access information regarding agents and tenants, and monitor all your servers through a centralized administration interface.

seg-source.mrk: You can access information regarding agents and tenants, and monitor all your servers through a centralized administration interface.

target.mrk: Vous pouvez accéder aux informations concernant les agents et les entités, et superviser tous vos serveurs via une interface d'administration centralisée.
